urls.title: Fury as parents of sick kids asked to sign coronavirus Do Not Resuscitate orders
urls.description: EXCLUSIVE: Shocked parents are asking if their kids' lives are thought not worth saving as most vulnerable are asked to sign don't resuscitate forms amid coronavirus crisis

text:
@piersmorgan @MattHancock What about this Piers? 
Why are the most vulnerable being abandoned to die like this?
This is not shielding.
The very people who need the most compassion and help are being ruthlessly denied it.
Blanket DNR's must be stopped.
https://t.co/H8jIpeKmMX
